data.eml:eml: Revision of the Afrotropical Pimentelia Laboissière, 1939 (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bolz, Helmut, Wagner, Thomas (2014): Revision of the Afrotropical Pimentelia Laboissière, 1939 (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae). Zootaxa 3881 (1): 49-62, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.1.4
